titleStmt.title: Memoirs of Edmund Ludlow Esq; Lieutenant General of the Horse, Commander in Chief of the forces in Ireland, one of the Council of State, and a Member of the Parliament which began on November 3, 1640. In two volumes. Vol. 2.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed at Vivay in the canton of Bern,

notesStmt.note: A third part was published the following year.
Only volume 2 (images 223-446) of this complete copy of volumes 1 and 2 is transcribed.
(Partial) reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery (reel 1762).
